verses.verse: Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall camp, <S%H2583><s%> each <S%H376><s%> by his own standard, <S%H1714><s%> with the banners <S%H226><s%> of their fathers' households; <S%H1004><s%> they shall camp <S%H2583><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> at a distance. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5048><s%>

"Now those who camp <S%H2583><s%> on the east <S%H9506><s%> side <S%H9506><s%> toward the sunrise <S%H4217><s%> [shall be] of the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> by their armies, <S%H6635><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab, <S%H5992><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 74600.

"And those who camp <S%H2583><s%> next <S%H5921><s%> to him [shall be] the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar: <S%H3485><s%> Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar, <S%H6686><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 54400.

"Then [comes] the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun: <S%H2074><s%> Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon, <S%H2497><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even his numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 57400.

"The total <S%H3605><s%> of the numbered <S%H6485><s%> men of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> 186400, by their armies. <S%H6635><s%> They shall set <S%H5265><s%> out first. <S%H7223><s%>

"On the south <S%H8486><s%> side <S%H8486><s%> [shall be] the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> by their armies, <S%H6635><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben: <S%H7205><s%> Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur, <S%H7707><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 46500.

"And those who camp <S%H2583><s%> next <S%H5921><s%> to him [shall be] the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon: <S%H8095><s%> Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai, <S%H6701><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 59300.

"Then [comes] the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad: <S%H1410><s%> Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Deuel, <S%H1845><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 45650.

"The total <S%H3605><s%> of the numbered <S%H6485><s%> men of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Reuben: <S%H7205><s%> 151450 by their armies. <S%H6635><s%> And they shall set <S%H5265><s%> out second. <S%H8145><s%>

"Then the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> shall set <S%H5265><s%> out [with] the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the camps; <S%H4264><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as they camp, <S%H2583><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> they shall set <S%H5265><s%> out, every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in his place, <S%H3027><s%> by their standards. <S%H1714><s%>

"On the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H3220><s%> [shall be] the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> by their armies, <S%H6635><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> [shall be] Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud, <S%H5989><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 40500.

"And next <S%H5921><s%> to him [shall be] the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur, <S%H6301><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 32200.

"Then [comes] the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%> Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni, <S%H1441><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 35400.

"The total <S%H3605><s%> of the numbered <S%H6485><s%> men of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> 108100, by their armies. <S%H6635><s%> And they shall set <S%H5265><s%> out third. <S%H7992><s%>

"On the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6828><s%> [shall be] the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> by their armies, <S%H6635><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan: <S%H1835><s%> Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai, <S%H5996><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 62700.

"And those who camp <S%H2583><s%> next <S%H5921><s%> to him [shall be] the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher: <S%H836><s%> Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ochran, <S%H5918><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 41500.

"Then [comes] the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> and the leader <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali: <S%H5321><s%> Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan, <S%H5881><s%>
and his army, <S%H6635><s%> even their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, 53400.

"The total <S%H3605><s%> of the numbered <S%H6485><s%> men of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> [was] 157600. They shall set <S%H5265><s%> out last <S%H314><s%> by their standards. <S%H1714><s%>"

These <S%H428><s%> are the numbered <S%H6485><s%> men of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by their fathers' households; <S%H1004><s%> the total <S%H3605><s%> of the numbered <S%H6485><s%> men of the camps <S%H4264><s%> by their armies, <S%H6635><s%> 603550.

The Levites, <S%H3881><s%> however, were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Thus the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did; <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> they camped <S%H2583><s%> by their standards, <S%H1714><s%> and so <S%H3651><s%> they set <S%H5265><s%> out, every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> by his family, <S%H4940><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to his father's household. <S%H1004><s%>
